channel.title: DSPK Deadlock And Combat System And Memory Leak Fixed
channel.description:
[CENTER]This is raw DSPK source. Only the following things were modified -Fixed combat bug where it always thought a prayer/divine was on -Fixed deadlock -Fixed memory leak -Fixed all possible dupes that remained unfix (including morg javs) -Added an autorestarter (server still does have randoms DCs, not sure what causes) *
If you don't need this you don't have to post. All credit obviously to nintendo.[/CENTER]

item.title: DSPK Deadlock And Combat System And Memory Leak Fixed
item.dc:creator: @PLayRooney PLayRooney
item.description:
@PLayRooney wrote:

Destined2bGreat:

You just aren’t getting it. This is not mine. The fix is, the base is not. This is for anyone who needs this, and there are a lot of people (I don’t give a fuck if they’re leechers) who need it. NOBODY CARES IF YOU DON’T LIKE PI. I don’t have an opinion on pi. I don’t host a server that is pi (or any whatsoever). I’m not releasing some epic thing nor releasing anything at all. This is a fix for the THOUSANDS of people who will download DSPK and host it. This is the download section, not the debate section.

Your very mad bro.

Read full topic

item.title: DSPK Deadlock And Combat System And Memory Leak Fixed
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

Now this is the only comment I’m posting on here:

I agree with Vain and Mendorphins due to the fact they’re right. Too many shit PI’s are out there, such as this one in my opinion, just a few changed names, NPC moving, tutorials, etc. What exactly did you add that was difficult, or that you didn’t leech off a tutorial? Every addition to this is merely a basic addition to PI. So, instead of working with PI, try to work on something worth working on, such as Hyperion. I’m currently working on a Hyperion due to the fact that I have come to terms with: “PI are merely shit.”
So, just stop flaming, stop trying to prove your point, accept it and move on. Work on something worthwhile.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=Jc22493 link=topic=478241.msg3501929#msg3501929 date=1297809578]

I’m not supporting either side on this, I’m only stating what I deem to make sense, so as a precaution, don’t start flaming me also… >_>

See. He’s an arrogant cunt. Eaxctly what happened to Vain.

I’ve nothing to prove about my self as a person, in nearly every post across this board I’ve stated I’m a very beginner in programming.

I can’t write music. I still think Chris Brown is shit!

I didn’t imply that he was flaming me.

You do making a perfectly valid statement about you and Chris Brown, although I do attribute arrogance to most members who post that PI is shit, etc, and that’s what gets me fired up.
[/quote]All I said we have enough shitty PI’s. Do you not agree? People download, edit name then release.

It’s spamming the download section, which in-turn spams the help sections.[/quote]
